thread.title: BRIEF-BAE Systems Says U.S. Navy Awarded Co $175 Million Contract For More Than 7,000 Advanced Precision Kill Weapon System Laser-Guided Rockets

title: BRIEF-BAE Systems Says U.S. Navy Awarded Co $175 Million Contract For More Than 7,000 Advanced Precision Kill Weapon System Laser-Guided Rockets

organizations.name: brief-bae systems says u.s. navy awarded co
advanced precision kill weapon system laser-guided rockets reuters staff

text:
Market News May 8, 2018 / 1:10 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-BAE Systems Says U.S. Navy Awarded Co $175 Million Contract For More Than 7,000 Advanced Precision Kill Weapon System Laser-Guided Rockets Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 8 (Reuters) - BAE Systems PLC:
* BAE SYSTEMS - U.S. NAVY AWARDED CO $175 MILLION CONTRACT FOR MORE THAN 7,000 COST-EFFICIENT ADVANCED PRECISION KILL WEAPON SYSTEM LASER-GUIDED ROCKETS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
